channel.title: Vivacity 2010
channel.description: The Annual Techno-Cultural-Management Fest of LNMIIT, Jaipur, India

item.title: Brand Advertisement
item.description: Due to some unavoidable circumstances, the event has been cancelled. Sorry for the inconvenience

item.title: English Debate
item.description: The Event is shifted to 19th February.

item.title: Event Schedules Out
item.description: The Event Schedules are officially released.

item.title: Code The Code
item.description: Prelims on 15th Feb, from 8:30 PM (IST) to 11:30 PM.

item.title: Brand Publicia
item.description: The problem statement has been released. Check out the rules section for more info

item.title: Robotics Workshop
item.description: Robotics Workshop is being organized this Vivacity.

item.title: 2000 Xceeded
item.description: The Viva-craze continues as the mega-fest draws nearer... We have officially crossed the magical 2000 mark!!!

item.title: KhoonChala
item.description: Khoon Do Jivan Do - Vivacity 2010 sends out the noble message of Blood Donation with a drive including donors from institutes and malls of Jaipur

item.title: Paintball is here!
item.description: Ever pwned your friend in a computer game... Come and do it live at Vivacity 2010!! For the first time in Jaipur, Vivacity 2010 presents Paintball in association with The Paintball Club, India

item.title: Parikrama LIVE!!!
item.description: PARIKRAMA to perform live at VIVACITY 2010 . Top 3 finalists of Raddrock to open for Parikrama

item.title: HacXploit 2010
item.description: Register for the ethical hacking workshop by Sunny Vaghela on the 19th and 20th of February 2010

item.title: 1000 Fans
item.description: Vivacity Facebook fan page has more than 1000 fans !!!

item.title: Vivacity goes International
item.description: Vivacity will be host to international guest speakers and students from across the globe

item.title: PaintBall
item.description: Witness paintball for the first time in Jaipur at Vivacity 2010

item.title: Online Registrations Open!!!
item.description: The online registrations for all events are officially open now!!! So don't waste more time... Register yourself and name the events you're interested in NOW!!!
